item.title: MS
item.description: score:-36 Chances: Morgan Stanley plans to launch an AI chatbot to enhance its services for wealthy clients, which could lead to improved customer engagement and satisfaction. The global wealth management industry is experiencing growth, and Morgan Stanley aims to capitalize on this trend by attracting investor attention.
